sentences.en: In real estate development, the Shanghai refined grow perceptibly.
sentences.cn: 而在房地产开发方面, 上海以精细见长.

sentences.en: In the proposition the thought is expressed perceptibly through the senses.
sentences.cn: 1在命题中,思想通过一种可由感官感觉到的方式来表达.

sentences.en: My relationship to Dr. Todt had become perceptibly closer in recent years.
sentences.cn: 这几年来,我和托特博士的关系显然愈加密切.

sentences.en: Pasterns of moderate length perceptibly finer in bone than the leg, and slightly slanting.
sentences.cn: 胶骨中等长度,可以察觉到骨骼比腿部细腻一些, 略微倾斜.

sentences.en: The skin under the eyes was perceptibly darker than it had been earlier.
sentences.cn: 眼睛下面皮肤的颜色显然比以前黑多了.

sentences.en: The wheat sprouts grew perceptibly after the rain.
sentences.cn: 下了一场雨,麦苗立刻见长.

sentences.en: They brisked up perceptibly at the good news.
sentences.cn: 他们一听到这则好消息,就欢跃起来.

sentences.en: With just this measure the driving dynamics are perceptibly improved.
sentences.cn: 只有这样的驾驶动力得到明显的改善措施.

words.tran_cn: 可察觉的；可感知的；看得见的
感知的，知觉的；有知觉力的
知觉地；有洞察力地；敏锐地
感觉力；理解力；可察觉性
知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取
显然地；可感觉得出地；看得出地
